DOC.brief_summary: A study to determine the accuracy of FLT-PET in quantifying tumor cell proliferation at the initial staging of patients with Non-Hodgkin's Lymphoma in comparison wit the "gold standard" FDG-PET.
DOC.brief_title: Assessment of Hematopoietic Recovery Following Chemotherapy for Non-Hodgkin's Lymphoma
DOC.detailed_description: The first primary objective reflects a necessary and preliminary requirement: to reproduce published results and validate the use of FLT-PET. In this study, 35 patients will be selected to undergoing imaging with both FLT and FDG PET.
DOC.criteria: 18 years or older Women must not be pregnant or breast feeding Histologic diagnosis of nonHodgkin's lymphoma (any stage) Must undergo treatment with chemotherapy and/or radiotherapy May not have received previous therapy with radiopharmaceuticals May not have received prior therapy with cytotoxic chemotherapy and/or monoclonal antibodies
